mapper.insert: insert into t_power (role_id, role_name, create_time, modify_time, role_describe) values (#{roleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{roleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{roleDescribe,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update t_power

modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where role_id = #{roleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select * from t_power where role_name like "%"#{roleName}"%"
